Trade/Device Name(s): Xpert MRSA/SA Skin and Soft Tissue Infection Assay
Specimen Type(s): Skin and soft tissue infection swab
Specimen Container(s): Double swab in tube with elution reagent
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Xpert MRSA/SA SSTI Assay, a real-time PCR assay for rapid qualitative detection of MRSA and SA DNA from skin and soft tissue swab specimens using the GeneXpert Dx System
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative in vitro diagnostic test for detection of Staphylococcus aureus (SA) and methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) DNA from skin and soft tissue infection swabs, used as an aid alongside other laboratory tests and clinical data, not intended for monitoring treatment.
